price: Is it that We have sent down to them any authority that speaks in support of their associating partners with Him?
arabic: أَمۡ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ يَتَكَلَّمُ بِمَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
